profile:
Ridge Meadows Roofing was founded in September 2001 by Trevor McDonald, who has more than 25 years of roofing experience. We specialize in residential asphalt shingle re-roofing and are certified CertainTeed ShingleMasters. Trevor is the son of Brian and Dorothy McDonald, who  successfully owned and operated McDonald’s Flooring in Maple Ridge for over 40 years. After taking several business and marketing classes in college, and then learning the trade over six years, Trevor decided to operate his own roofing company. Beginning as a modest residential re-roofing and repairing business, Ridge Meadows Roofing has grown into a full-fledged team of skilled professionals, who consistently provide great service and demonstrate their workmanship on each and every roof. But even with a talented team of roofing professionals, Trevor carefully oversees all tasks.
 
We service the following areas and beyond; Maple Ridge, Pitt Meadows, Port Coquitlam, Coquitlam, Port Moody, Langley, Surrey, Burnaby and Vancouver.
 
Book a FREE no-obligation written quote today!

profile:
Building your dreams with blackbelt precision, that's our motto at Black Belt. We keep a tight crew at Black Belt to maintain our reputation as skilled, high end builders with an eye for detail. We commit the same level of quality from the smallest project to a complete home renovation, and we've maintained that from the beginning. With our uniquely qualified crew we can tackle any project thrown our way, from interior tiles to high end hardwood decks. With the highest standards for cleanliness and quality you will not be disappointed with your finished Black Belt project, give us a call today for a free quote! For more photos of our latest projects check out our instagram @blackbeltcontracting_inc

Meet our Team!

Fraser (Director of Operations) 
Clients are always excited to see Fraser’s evident knowledge and passion – a result of his range of experience, commitment, and drive. Born and raised in the lower mainland, Fraser has been in construction for almost two decades. Believing in a lead-by-example approach, Fraser thoroughly enjoys being on site with the crew – to offer this experience and pass it on. He is involved in every step of the process to turn your dreams into a reality, which keeps him busy! In his time out of work, Fraser enjoys keeping fit, with a history in martial arts, and is helped along by running after his small collection of dogs and cats. 

Katie (Director of Design)
Black Belt’s darling – Katie – joined the Black Belt team over a decade ago and her precision, attention to detail and energy all combined to lead to the fruition of Katie’s main joy: her tiling. From intricate designs, to pristine execution, clients are astounded with what Katie delivers. After pouring her love into her work, Katie manages to find some more for her sporting life, where she also coaches. She credits her work ethic to her father, grandfather and other family members, whom she enjoys spending her free time with.
services: General renovations (kitchen and bathroom), tile setting, finishing carpentry, exterior siding and decking
specialities: Custom tile designs and structural builds
name: Black Belt Contracting Inc

The finished product is just icing on the cake.
 
Our personal connection with clients in defining their needs into concrete concepts is the reason many become long lasting friendships.
 
It’s why ADR Contracting has become the premier choice in Vancouver for those looking to transform their living space into new possibilities. We are your diamond in the rough!
 
We’ll make sure you understand the scope and details to ensure we meet your desired budget. Once we are fully aligned with the outcome, our ADR Contracting team will begin to provide quality work, focusing on every detail necessary to provide a fantastic finished product. 
 
We are fully licensed in everything we do. We are HomeStars Verified, BBB Accredited and members of WorkSafe BC. We also have $5,000,000 in liability insurance to give you complete peace of mind.

profile:
Welcome to Buhler Painting Ltd!
Buhler Painting is committed to managing our projects with integrity and attention to detail. We have experience in painting homes, new residential projects, commercial properties and businesses with excellence!

Buhler Painting Ltd is a full-service painting company located in Abbotsford, British Columbia servicing Vancouver and the entire Fraser Valley.  When the company was founded in 2006, we quickly realized that by taking care of our clients, offering fair prices, and delivering what we promised on time, people wanted to do business with us. This foundation of Buhler Painting has allowed us to work with hundreds of clients over the years.

Thanks to our remarkable clients who have referred us to others, we have grown to be a reputable and reliable painting company known for our fair prices, quality work, and reliable staff-a reputation known throughout the Lower Mainland.

We finish with distinction - Quality workmanship you can trust

If you have any questions, or would like to book a quote, please do not hesitate in contacting our Project Coordinator, Karen Denevers at 604-855-1042.

We appreciate your time in viewing our galleries and considering Buhler Painting for your next residential or commercial project.
specialities:
1- Very Fair Prices: We guarantee a competitive price and a detailed estimate leaving you confident that our work will fit within your budget and bring your vision to reality.

2- Quality Work: Our top of the line equipment and well trained staff provide professional service and quality work you can trust.

3- Reliability: We work hard to complete your project with a quality finish, meet your timeline and save you money.
name: Buhler Painting Ltd.

profile:
Urban Roots Build Co. Inc. is a Certified Residential Building Company and design build construction firm specializing in Custom Home build projects and renovations. We like to consider ourselves unique in that we truly care about the best interests of our customers. Straight up, honest, easy going and transparent…we are passionate about our craft and would love to work with you to offer advice and help you make the best decisions possible for your building project.

Over the last 25 years Mark and Grant have been very active in many facets of the building industry. They have worked for several top firms ranging from residential development to design build of medium to high end custom homes and renovations. From direct site management to management of construction divisions and company general management.

Our best sense of accomplishment comes when a homeowner is appreciating their new home and reflecting on how much they enjoyed the journey!

Call Mark to discuss your home project ideas and to discuss the process.

profile:
Welcome to Prime Kitchen and Bath where we specialize in making your renovation dreams come true! We offer a variety of Home Renovation services including:


Home Additions
Kitchen Renovations
Bathroom Renovations
Basement Renovations
Complete Condo Renovations
Custom Home Building

Prime Kitchen and Bath offers a complete process from start to finish with each project. We start out by a free consultation, followed through with a free estimate. Once the estimate is accepted we then start on the design stage. Once approved by you, the homeowner, your dreams start to turn into a reality. 


Prime Kitchen and Bath has all the right professionals to do each and every job. Hiring the right Contractor can save you thousands of dollars, because the right contractor does things right the first time... Every time. Keeping your project running smoothly with completion dates on time and within budget.


We operate on the best foundation a business can operate on, that is Honesty and Integrity. We stand behind everything we do and everything we say. We guarantee our work and that is what gives you, our Number 1 priority: Confidence and Peace of Mind.


WE PROVIDE SERVICES TO THE ENTIRE LOWER MAINLAND OF B.C. 


No budget is too big or to small. Here at Prime Kitchen and Bath we will work with you on your budget. Please fill in the Request for a Free Quote form if you're interested, and one of our sales members will contact you within 24 hours and set up a consultation.


Prime Kitchen and Bath is a member of the National Kitchen & Bath Association.

profile:
exceptional design.
extraordinary innovation.

It all begins with an idea. 
Maybe you want to launch a business. 
Or maybe you are just tired of what you have and want a change. 

Modera Developments has over a 13 years of experience in many facets of home renovations, design, construction, and project management. 
With our on-staff team of trade specialists, we’re able to offer competitive rates and a one-stop shop for your next build. 

Floor to Ceiling.
Renovations are a big undertaking, even the smallest of projects. 
We can help make these simple and easy with painting, flooring, ceiling resurfacing, and advice on best practices. 

Everything in-Between.
You may have the floors and ceilings covered, but what about the walls? We offer in-house trade specialists for plumbing, electrical, and insulation (spray foam or fiberglass). 
We also offer drywall services.

Providing the Right Support.
As part of being a one-stop shop, we can repair or replace your existing roof, from just the tiles/singles to a full replacement. 
Framing services are also available.

From the Ground up.
Starting from scratch? Looking to build a new lane home or coach house on your property? 
Let Modera design and build your home extension. 
We’re always on the cutting edge of trends for modular and condensed-footing homes, and can recommend options to maximize livability and budget.
